Package com.stormpath.spring.security.provider

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountGrantedAuthorityResolver
    An AccountGrantedAuthorityResolver inspects a Stormpath Account and returns that Account's directly assigned GrantedAuthoritys.
    AccountPermissionResolver
    An AccountPermissionResolver inspects a Stormpath Account and returns that Account's directly assigned Permissions.
    AuthenticationTokenFactory
    Interface to be implemented as a factory for Authentication tokens.
    GroupGrantedAuthorityResolver
    A GroupGrantedAuthorityResolver inspects a Stormpath Group and returns that Group's assigned GrantedAuthoritys.
    GroupPermissionResolver
    A GroupPermissionResolver inspects a Stormpath Group and returns that Group's assigned Permissions.
    PermissionResolver
    A PermisisonResolver resolves a String value and converts it into a Permission instance.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountCustomDataPermissionResolver
    A CustomDataPermissionResolver implementation that merely delegates lookup logic to the parent class, first calling account.getCustomData().
    CustomDataPermissionResolver
    A CustomDataPermissionResolver accesses a specific named field value of a CustomData resource that contains a Set&lt;String&gt; of Spring Security permission Strings.
    DefaultGroupGrantedAuthorityResolver
    Default implementation of the GroupGrantedAuthorityResolver interface that allows a Stormpath Group to be translated into Spring Security granted authorities based on custom preferences.
    EmptyAccountGrantedAuthorityResolver
    An AccountGrantedAuthorityResolver that always returns an empty set of granted authorities.
    GroupCustomDataPermissionResolver
    A CustomDataPermissionResolver implementation that merely delegates lookup logic to the parent class, first calling group.getCustomData().
    StormpathAuthenticationProvider
    A AuthenticationProvider implementation that uses the Stormpath Cloud Identity Management service for authentication and authorization operations for a single Application.
    StormpathUserDetails
    Models Stormpath account information retrieved by a StormpathAuthenticationProvider.
    UsernamePasswordAuthenticationTokenFactory
    A AuthenticationTokenFactory implementation that creates representation of a username and password token.
    WildcardPermissionResolver
    GrantedAuthorityResolver implementation that returns a new WildcardPermission based on the input string.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DefaultGroupGrantedAuthorityResolver.Mode  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidPermissionStringException
    Thrown by PermissionResolver.resolvePermission(String) when the String being parsed is not valid for that resolver.
